subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kari Lehtonen made a career-high 49 saves Monday night, falling 1 minute 15 seconds short of shutting out the Washington Capitals in the Thrashers’ 5-1 win.
snippet: Kari Lehtonen made a career-high 49 saves Monday night, falling 1 minute 15 seconds short of shutting out the Washington Capitals in the Thrashers’ 5-1 win.
